revised_title: Isaac Barrow: A Mid-17th Century Polymath and Mentor
tldr: This book review discusses the life and work of Isaac Barrow, a 17th-century scholar, mathematician, and theologian. Barrow made significant contributions to the fields of geometry, optics, and mathematics, and was a mentor to the famous scientist Isaac Newton. The book presents a comprehensive re-evaluation of Barrow's life and work, exploring his academic achievements and influence during his time.
